summary:
## Nibiru Cataclysm: A False Alarm

Some people believed a huge planet called Nibiru or Planet X would crash into Earth in the early 21st century, causing massive destruction. This idea started with Nancy Lieder, who claimed aliens told her about it.  However, scientists say there's no evidence for Nibiru and it's just a made-up story.  They've looked for planets beyond Neptune and found some possibilities, but none are on a collision course with Earth.
title: Nibiru cataclysm
